moveReservationToActive(String) - Static method in class jdbc.mysqlConnection
Processes a reservation check-in request by validating the reservation timing and either moving it to active parking or returning a status indicating the next step.
mysqlConnection - Class in jdbc
This class provides database-related utility methods for managing BPARK system data, such as subscribers, reservations, parking spots, and active parkings.
